Rosen Skincare Charcoal mask (2020 formulation)

Brand: Rosen Skincare

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Bentonite Clay, Water (Aqua), Denatured Alcohol, Activated Charcoal, Castor Oil (Ricinus Communis Seed), Tea Tree (Melaleuca Alternifolia Leaf) Oil

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Developmental and Reproductive Toxi
nd Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer
